website_summaries.verdict: The Etnies Cartel displays simplicity packed with comfortable and durable elements fitting for onboard abuse. Many reviewers praised its puffy design that provides ample cushioning and the premium craftsmanship for lasting sneaker life. Few skaters also lauded its reliable grip that allows them to have better control of the board. Overall, the Cartel exhibits elements that will elevate one's skate performance and street fashion style while staying affordable.
pros: The Etnies Cartel is found at a wallet-friendly price range
The majority of the reviewers shared that the Etnies Cartel is exceptionally comfortable
A couple of buyers mentioned that this pair has reliable durability
The board grip is superb, shared few skaters
Several wearers praised the high-quality materials applied to this footwear
The excellent cushioning of the Etnies Cartel has been cited numerous times in the reviews
This pair is offered in various colorways
Several respondents highly recommended this footwear
This sneaker runs true to size
cons: The Etnies Cartel is a tad narrow for few reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Narrow toe box, and fits "short"
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for enduro riding w/ flats. Look ok, and constructions seems fine, but they fit small (toes touched the front of the shoe) and the toe box is really narrow. Sadly, back they go.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Tight squeeze
customer_reviews.text: The shoe most have changed, these use to fit my fat toes. Not anymore. I would recommend getting a size up or a different brand. They fit alright when nearly untied.
customer_reviews.author: D. lingerfelt

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable design.cool look.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pair of sneakers they are my everyday sneakers ever since I first put them on I haven't wear another pair of shoes,stylish comfortable great look. Perfect overall.
customer_reviews.author: David R Leazard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but run about 1/2 size small.
customer_reviews.text: The Product Details said "True to size. Order usual size", but they would go on easier if I had ordered a half size larger. Otherwise, they are comfortable and otherwise as I expected. Decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: amazing fit
customer_reviews.text: they fit amazing and feel great on my foot well worth it
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats the feel of a good skate shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these because I hadn't bought myself a pair of skate shoes in nearly a decade. Just as comfortable and stylish as I remember.
customer_reviews.author: Mikoul

customer_reviews.title: Made in Vietnam
customer_reviews.text: Tongues are too thick and hurt too of foot. Don't know if that will ever go away.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy day

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but know your foot size
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but need to break them in...a little small
customer_reviews.author: Abdahl Price

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: They look good, but they're too narrow. I have other Etnies shoes that steal extremely comfortable. Not these. Hopefully they break in.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but a full size too small
customer_reviews.text: The Ethies Marana Michelin Is one of the best skateboard shoes on the market, but be aware they run a full size smaller than most other shoes. Order a full size larger and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: adam brody

customer_reviews.title: Good traction
customer_reviews.text: Bf said they fit a lil tight but they grip his board great and seem pretty durable. As long as he's happy I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Cordero

product_meta.title: Etnies Men's Cartel Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: The cartel is one of the latest additions to the Etnies footwear family. With a sharp, fast and clean design on a new 300 NBS rubber cupsole, the cartel features the trademark Etnies arrow logo, beveled edge for extra style, and STI foam lite level 1 foot bed and padded tongue and collar for comfort and protection.
feature_bullets: Padded tongue and collar for comfort
